bean.description: Details of one specific order approval

property.name: code
property.description: Code that identifies the approval.

property.name: order
property.description: Order linked to this approval.

property.name: approvalDecisionRequired
property.description: Boolean flag which states whether an approval decision is required.

property.name: customerOrderApprovalRecords
property.description: Customer approval records related to this order approval.

property.name: merchantOrderApprovalRecords
property.description: Merchant approval records related to this order approval.

property.name: trigger
property.description: Replenishment trigger if this is an approval for a replenishment order.

property.name: decisionDate
property.description: Decision date for B2B customer.

property.name: approvalComments
property.description: Approval comments for B2B customer.

bean.description: Details of one order approval record

property.name: permissionTypes
property.description: List of permission types related to this approval record.

property.name: approver
property.description: Principal responsible to this approval record.

property.name: statusDisplay
property.description: Status of the order approval.

property.name: comments
property.description: Any comments the approver (or the workflow system) added to the approval item.

bean.description: Representation of a Trigger

property.name: activationTime
property.description: The time the trigger will be activated

property.name: displayTimeTable
property.description: Description of when the trigger is being activated

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Order Approval Permission Type data. Typical permission types are: B2BBudgetExceededPermission, B2BOrderThresholdTimespanPermission and B2BOrderThresholdPermission

property.description: Code of the Order Approval Permission Type

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the Order Approval Permission Type

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This bean may have relationships to other Org Unit WsDTO, whose type are WsDTO beans as well.

property.name: orgUnit
property.description: The unit of the Budget

property.name: costCenters
property.description: List of Cost Centers

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This base bean has no relationship fields to other Org Unit WsDTOs

property.name: active
property.description: Boolean flag of whether the Budget is active

property.name: budget
property.description: Value of Budget

property.name: code
property.description: Code of the Budget

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the Budget

property.name: currency
property.description: Currency of the Budget

property.name: startDate
property.description: The start date of the Budget

property.name: endDate
property.description: The end date of the Budget

property.name: selected
property.description: Boolean flag whether the budget is selected for a cost center

bean.description: Representation of a cost center. This bean may have relationships to other Org Unit WsDTO, whose type are WsDTO beans as well.

property.name: unit
property.description: The parent unit of the cost center

property.name: assignedBudgets
property.description: Budgets assigned to this cost center

bean.description: Representation of a cost center. This base bean has no relationship fields to other Org Unit WsDTOs

property.name: originalCode
property.description: The original code of the cost center. Deprecated since 2005.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the cost center

property.name: active
property.deprecated: since 2005, read-only, used for display purposes
property.description: Indication of whether the cost center is active. Deprecated since 2005. Read-only, used for display purposes.

property.name: activeFlag
property.description: Boolean flag of whether the cost center is active.

property.name: code
property.description: The code of the cost center

property.name: currency
property.description: The currency of the cost center

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This bean is shallow, which means its potential relationship fields to other Org Unit fields are simple ids. No Org Unit WsDTO should be declared in this bean to avoid circular references.
